title: The Innes of Court anagrammatist: or, The masquers masqued in anagrammes Expressed in epigramique lines, upon their severall names, set downe in the next page. Composed by Francis Lenton Gent. one of her Majesties poets.
author: Lenton, Francis, fl. 1630-1640.
publisher: Printed [by T. Harper] for William Lashe,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
